hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #0# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Bolero of Fire# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #the Key#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #1# major item.

HC (Rock Wall).text: Did you know that you only need to play the Song of Time to open the Door of Time? The Spiritual Stones are not needed.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #the Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Minuet of Forest#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Minuet of Forest#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Volvagia#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Kokiri Sword# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.
hinted_locations: KF GS Know It All House

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple Boss Key# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Small Key# and #a Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

LH (Southwest Corner).text: We don't make mistakes, we have happy accidents.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that Ganondorf will appear in the next Mario Tennis.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Sun's Song# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Water Temple Boss Key# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Song of Time#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Ice Cavern#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Song of Time#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #0# major items.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.
